One quick stabbed with his lightsaber and it was all over. Luckily he had him give complete control of the army and navy before he killed him. Plus, with Sidious already doctored the holo recording showing him saving him from the Jedi that came here to arrest him. It shouldn't be that hard to convince the senate to make him the empire instead of Sidious.

141.title: The Clone Wars

1411.content:
It was night on a backwater planet in thr outer rim. It was cold as the wind blew, there clouds in the sky. Both Ahsoka and Barriss felt the chill but could do little about it. Both where cold and hungry, its been three days since their transport crashed landed here. They where being chased by separatists fighters, they didn't even know if their distress signal was received. They where out of rations and had no credits, Ahsoka cursed the order for there belief in no money. She and Barriss where hiding in alley, the city was barely being then Nul Hutta. It was filled with bounty hunters, merces and other criminals. Both where exhausted and on the brink of giving up.

" We need to get off this planet, Ahsoka." Said Barriss, Ahsoka sighed.

" I know but we don't have any credits to pay for a transport." Said Ahsoka.

" I don't see why we can't just say we're Jedi and demand transport." Said Barriss.

Ahsoka sighed, " Barriss, one most people don't like Jedi and I very much doubt they would help and two the separatists have put a huge Bounty on Jedi. Almost one of the smugglers on this planet would sell us out without a second thought." Said Ahsoka, Barriss let out a sigh this time.

"What's going on in that head, Snips?" she heard Annie ask her. She turned to see her Masters smirk in her direction. Ahsoka was supicious. "I'm just wondering what your up to. You've been almost giddy lately." she said with narrowed eyes.

It was true. In the days leading up to her 18th birthday (today) Annie had gotten increasingly excited for some reason. Subtle Annie Skywalker was not.
